title: How to Use Microsoft Office by Talking Instead of Typing

steps.headline: Select 'Ease of Access' and click 'Start Speech Recognition'
Take the tutorial.
steps.description: After you've finished, open Microsoft Word

steps.headline: Click the microphone icon at the top of the screen.

tyn: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion or Windows 7/8
Microphone attached to computer (laptops and notepads may have one)
text: Mac Open System Preferences.  Go to 'Dictation and speech'  Select 'Turn on Dictation  Open Microsoft Word  Press the Function (fn) key twice  Start speaking  Windows Right click on the desktop  Select 'Personalize'  Click 'Control Panel Home'  Select 'Ease of Access' and click 'Start Speech Recognition'  Take the tutorial. After you've finished, open Microsoft Word Click the microphone icon at the top of the screen. Start speaking
